Reviews.Title: For the price, simply fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Renee

} } } Length:: 1:09 MinsThis is a quick review of the Samsung Galaxy Y S5360, Hello Kitty edition. ;)

Reviews.Title: is a awesome phone
Reviews.Author: thanks
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. It works great plus it has everything my DROID did. All i had to do is but a sim card and call and activate to t mobile. This phone can also be set up on any network that uses sim cards.

Reviews.Title: Super CUTE!
Reviews.Author: Wendy V Brejot
Reviews.Content: Pros It's Hello KittySmall enough to fit in pocket or a coin purse.Uses a SIM card.Has a hole for charms or a strap.It has WiFi and Blue Tooth capabilities.It runs on Android.It can use a Micro SD card up to 32 gig.Uses a standard 3.5 mm headphone jack.It was unlocked.Will work with an American charger.Has a predictive text option.Auto rotation.It's under $200 US dollars.Multiple language options.Will work on American Mobile networks. You just need a little patients and some understanding of how international mobile networks operate.  More on that later.It can be used as a Wifi Hotspot. My Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 3DS XL were both able to connect to it.Has a speaker phone option.Has voice recognition software for searching or taking memos.Swype can be used if you don't like the small virtual QWERTY key pad.American apps will work on this phone.Things that could have been better...2 mega pixcel camera has no dedicated camera button.Radio needs headphones to be plugged in in order to function.I don't know about other people but my phone didn't come with the default Hello Kitty software. It came with the standard software for the regular Samsung Galaxy Y. NO HK power up/down animation. NO HK icons. NO HK wallpapers. NO HK ringtones. Lucky there are a lot of downloadable HK theme sets on the Google Play Market. Some of them are FREE. If you are brave or smart enough you can also root your phone. Or you can download a custom HK rom.Just a little warning for American buyers. This phone is not quite 3G compatible here in the USA. We use a different cell phone radio frequency then Europe and Asia. They use GSM-900 and GSM-1800  but we use  GSM-850 and GSM-1900. Somebody please correct me if I'm wrong.  It will connect to American mobile networks but it will use EDGE. There is no software work around for this. This phone just doesn't have the right HARDWARE to pick up American 3G. Since it will only work on EDGE here, internet will be kinda slow. But from my experience calls, text, and e-mail will work normally. If you have access to WiFi, then please use it when ever possible.  I can't call this a con at all. I can't get mad at Samsung or at my provider ATT. Samsung had no idea that we Americans would import this phone. American cell phone service providers like ATT can't be forced to use European/Asian cell phone frequencies. Samsung has also made an official announcement that there will be no more OS upgrades for the Galaxy Y phones. The last upgrade is Android 2.3.6 so if you really want Jelly Bean, you'll have to look around on the net if you can't program a custom OS yourself.Some folks have complained about the small screen size. Not an issue for me. I'm used to the small size of Nintendo DS screens.Some folks have complained about call sound quality. I have not noticed any sound distortion. People I have called say I sound very clear. I can hear them very clearly as well. As for text and messaging issues, contact your provider. Chances are, the APN setting may need tweaking.If you get a SIM card error, just contact your provider. They may be able to transfer your stuff over to a new SIM card for a small fee. Something under $10.Some MUST have accessories. Miss Kitty is a fashionable young lady is she not? XDI have heard that the touch screen of the Galaxy Y is not made of the same material as it's family members. A screen protector will take care of any scratches.A case! There are a few that would look good on this phone and not cover up Miss Kitty's pretty face. Amazon has a clear/frost white TPU gel case. There's a also a clear/frost pink TPU case that look cute too.A stylus! Amazon sells some universal capacitive touch screen styli that would match perfectly. I haven't seen any HK ones but a plain white or pink would go very well with this phone.Amazon also sells a lot of HK themed cell phone accessories like charms, holsters, and straps.If you love Hello Kitty, just take this product for what it is. Don't get all huffy just because it's not a as fast as an American smart Phone, you've been warned!

Reviews.Title: The unlocked phone is AWESOME.
Reviews.Author: Leland S. Bahe
Reviews.Content: I really did not know what to get for my niece. Browsing Amazon for an iPad become a job for a day and suddenly she fell in love with the Samsung Hello Kitty Phone. I wasn't really enthusiastic, especially reading other reviews. So, with the price it was gonna save me money. I ordered and it came fully in a secure package. I opened and I was amazed at how neat the little thing was. I played with it and watch videos on it. It has built in WiFi, 2GB SD card, USB cord, Charger and happy ringtones. Awesome for teens.One good tip: GO TO SAMSUNG KIES AND DOWNLOAD SAMSUNG KIES SO YOUR NEW HELLO KITTY PHONE WILL BE ABLE TO SYNC MUSIC AND PHOTOS. IT IS BECAUSE THE DEVICE IS FOREIGN.BOTTOM LINE: I LOVE IT AND MY NIECE LOVES IT TOO. VERY EASY AND RIGHT FOR HER.

Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: CK
Reviews.Content: Great value for money The phone's default language is not English, however clear instructions to change it are right on the box. Package arrived earlier than expected as well! Gotta luv that.

Reviews.Title: This has been a great buy!
Reviews.Author: Mae Yasmin
Reviews.Content: I bought this cellphone about a week ago and I love it! The cellphone is fast and very good size for my small hands. I would recommend this phone plus its really cute!

Reviews.Title: I like so much
Reviews.Author: Virginia
Reviews.Content: It's a very cute phone, the apps and sound are very cute, everything is about kitty. Excellent conditions, the send very carefull. It's lovely and works excellent in my country.Thank you so much

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Pavel
Reviews.Content: Its a noce phone. Cheap in price but good in quality. Recommended.so far could not find any problem with the phone.

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE, must buy! Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Kitty4u27
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about 3 weeks AND Good god, I Love it!, It does exactly what I want it to do: It's fast, holds up a lot of memory and remains fast speed, downloads apps and music instantly if its a good file, Love the look! :) You have to adjust the light on the camera but hold it steady but the pic quality is ok. The headphones are amazingly loud and great coonvenient length. Love the long charger, no complaints! Honestly!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!
Reviews.Author: julie maestas
Reviews.Content: My daughter is 13 and she loves this phone! It's perfect for her and she loves showing it off! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my teen daughter
Reviews.Author: glory_usa "glory_usa"
Reviews.Content: I am leery of my kid having too much technology at her fingertips and being too plugged in with internet, etc.  So it was really silly of me to agree to buy her this phone.  (Actually she said she'd pay me from the allowance she's saved, but I've yet to see the cash. But, I digress...) Anyway, the phone is very cute, and has nice features.  It's got a functional, albeit lower grade camera on the back.  She can download music, surf the web, chat with buddies on Skype, and play games like Angry Birds (one of her favorite apps).  It's got custom Hello Kitty wallpaper and ringtones.  The size is right, not too large like some of the smart-phones on the market.  For us, it was a right fit for the price point.  My daughter has been thrilled with the purchase, so we are satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Hello kitty Samsung
Reviews.Author: Pong "Missey"
Reviews.Content: The day when I got my phone I was so excited ,I love n like it a lot ,when I turn it on the phone was on a Spanish language but  I able to change it to English

Reviews.Title: Exactly as specified.
Reviews.Author: Stefanie
Reviews.Content: Pros- Hello Kitty! Small handset Android OS Unlocked Takes great pictures outdoorsCons- No front facing camera Low screen resolution Takes low quality pictures indoors Difficult to text if you have large(r) fingers

Reviews.Title: PROMPT Delivery, EXACTLY as advertised - PERFECT for my 11 year old daughter!
Reviews.Author: N. Armani
Reviews.Content: This phone came yesterday after only 6 days from ordering - great delivery time for our location.As the phone initially powers up in 'German', there were two sets of instrucitons on how to set it to English (or whatever other language you wanted).  Simple, two button pushes and we were in English.It comes with a 4GB SD card and sets up VERY easily.The screen is clear and sharp - even though it might be a bit small for my fat fingers, it's perfect for my daughter.I am VERY pleased with the response time, sound quality, text to speech and all!Thank you - very nice!

Reviews.Title: Phone review Samsung
Reviews.Author: dottie b  davis
Reviews.Content: Nice phone good price  good beginner phone and nice design  It's too early yet to know if there are any problems but so far do good. I'm pleased

Reviews.Title: My little sister loved it!
Reviews.Author: eatRICEtoday
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 10 year old sister, and she loves it! The hardware is a little outdated and it won't play some of the newer games. But it's good enough for a kid who loves Hello Kitty so much. This is an inexpensive yet premium Hello Kitty product!

Reviews.Title: Hello Kitty
Reviews.Author: FenixFlys "FenixFlys"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it! Its simple to use and she loves Hello Kitty...her friends all want her phone.Games, radio, wonderful...she can't stop talking about it.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy Y
Reviews.Author: Kirat
Reviews.Content: I bought this present as a gift for my wife. She loves i very much. The phone is very slim and pretty. The only disadvantage is that it does not play video from the mails even after downloading the additional software, probably because of it's low RAM. BEsides that the phone is very nice and something very different.

Reviews.Title: Cute!
Reviews.Author: Yemsha Pares
Reviews.Content: The Charger adapter came a little flawed. The cell cute and adorable!!! Covers all my expectations and serves perfect in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone!
Reviews.Author: nicole al-assaf
Reviews.Content: Although this phone is little compared to all the new hi-tech ones out there now, this phone is very fast and has everything I need.  I love that it has a radio, although you have to use headphones with it and I couldnt get good reception in the brick building that I live in which I am used to.  It also has a small screen but is able to do all the this al the hi-tech phones can do....its a gooogle phone..!!!! I love it...Its pink and pretty....

Reviews.Title: Excelente!!
Reviews.Author: Luisana Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, recomendado 100%. Juvenil, perfecto para mi hija que esta entrando en la etapa adolescente... es super rapido y muy femenino.

Reviews.Title: I love My Hello kitty Phone
Reviews.Author: ms neesh "johneesha"
Reviews.Content: I love the Phone & i recieved The Phone in 2 days its cute and has everything i need for a decent price

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Yuen Cheng
Reviews.Content: It has all the function that I need but one thing I hate is the instruction doesn't match the phone and doesn't has all the things that I need to know

Reviews.Title: Excelente en Venezuela
Reviews.Content: LLego super rapido al Pais, funciona perfectamente en Venezuela todo super recomendado es bellisimo lo ameeeeee  demasiado bonito y elegante 5 estrellas sin dudarlo

Reviews.Title: My First Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Prison Break Fan!
Reviews.Content: I've only had this phone for one day & I love it.Easy to use and it's super cute! Much better than my other Hello Kitty phone (S5230).If you want/need a smartphone and you adore HK this is the phone for you!

Reviews.Title: International cellphone-DO not Buy In US
Reviews.Author: Mia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because of the high ratings . It is  very Cute phone and had everything I needed. It worked with Straight Talk about 1month in, the phone froze and there is no technical support in US. I have e -mailled the seller waiting for a reply so I will keep you posted. At this point, it has been a waste of my money. I can not change the APN settings and have the Android icon upper left side of screen, the bars are there but the screen keeps saying " Phone freeze" and will not let me get into the Menu screen at all.

Reviews.Title: Hello Kitty Heaven
Reviews.Author: StefiKittie
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a Hello Kitty phone that I could bring to my own carrier and would take pictures. This phone was perfect. The picture resolution is great. I can take video of my baby and post to facebook. Love the android OS. If you are looking for a phone to replace your iphone or higher end phone this will not be your phone, but if your looking for a phone to keep you connected and organized, for social networks, email, music, and media, this is the phone for you. A love for Hello Kitty is also required because she is everywhere on this phone: Ringtones, Wallpaper, Buttons, and Icons.

Reviews.Title: great phone but a little small
Reviews.Author: L. Corralez "lolo"
Reviews.Content: this phone works great,. but i think i need one a little larger would be a great phone for a younger individual. but does everything a bigger phone does

Reviews.Title: i love this phone
Reviews.Author: strawberry mom
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my 11 yrs. old daughter. Its very useful for her. when she needs to look for something thru internet at school(emergency), or listen to music(when she is at home), she can even watch on line(on weekends). I really love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Not Good.
Reviews.Author: Mayerwin
Reviews.Content: The battery is gone so fast. It is hardly to use it. But looks good. I stopped to use it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Hello Kitty phone
Reviews.Author: sherry jackson
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter loves it!!!!!  It works better than my Galaxy 3 that cost 3 times as much.  I am considering getting this model for myself.  It is super fast, easy to text and has so many standard features!!!!!!  A truly amazing phone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: K-RON H.
Reviews.Content: I got it for my daughter for Xmas. I didn't open it cause wanted her to be person to open the box. Stop working in first hour after she open it. Tired to hard reset it didn't work. Phone is frozen. Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Great for my child
Reviews.Author: Hugo Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I bought this telephone for my child here in Vvenezuela and it works perfect with movistar Very recommended for children because the keybord is very small

Reviews.Title: Cute...
Reviews.Author: Sassy1
Reviews.Content: Nice Hello Kitty phone. I bought it for my niece as a gift and she really like it. I also bought the clear case for her to go with it.

Reviews.Title: good prized item
Reviews.Author: Kenroy    Rawlins
Reviews.Content: Functioning well so far. No problem at the moment. I think it is a good priced item. The features are well worth the price

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sluward D  Barway
Reviews.Content: it is working very well I like it money well spent, not like the super pad two that I wasted my money on I have no regret in getting this phone at all.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy y s5360
Reviews.Author: DJQQueen "djqqueen"
Reviews.Content: Worked ok with t mobile. Did its job for about 6 months and then I could'nt get signal constantly. Bad for texting cuz its so small and im petite! Its a 3g phone but I wasnt able to get or feel like I had a 3g phone. Good for emergencies or back up but beware it doesnt it stopped getting signal after just 6 months. Only great thing is that its hello kitty!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Alverick Alvarez
Reviews.Content: Great phone! Looks cute, my daughter loves it and the hello kitty theme was definitely the icing on the cake. Would recommend for it's cuteness factor

Reviews.Title: Phone fit description
Reviews.Author: Paul G. Defreese "The Discovering Alcoholic"
Reviews.Content: Phone fit the published description.  Looking for a low cost unique solution and this fit the bill.  No surprises and no problems.

Reviews.Title: i love this phone!!!
Reviews.Author: jade
Reviews.Content: This phone has everything you need.it is cute especially the graphics of the phone .I very think you should bye, so!! .awsome!!.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: amber rose
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. It's so easy and user friendly. I'm so not tech saavy and I thought it was purely adorable.The only dislike is that icons can't be changed...and were kinda confusing at first. You get that with any new gadget though.Seriously, a great phone for anyone who likes Hello Kitty, cute things, pink, or you just want a reliable phone that whistles when you get texted (haha!)

Reviews.Title: Very cute
Reviews.Author: Naomi
Reviews.Content: I so love my phone and i am satisfied with it considering the very reasonable price for an android phone.

Reviews.Title: great so far
Reviews.Author: CR
Reviews.Content: It's thin. no lie. I am use to a phone with more weight but its still a great phone. I had to upgrade finally. so its cool. nothing to complain about yet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cellphone!
Reviews.Author: Raymond Bandhan
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone as a present for my 16 yr old niece.She chose this phone because it was "Sooo cute".I have always trusted the Samsung brand and especially the Galaxy line.Phone was an international unit and powered up in German.Came with instructions on how to change to English.After that, setup was a breeze.The phone is simple to use, not at all complicated and is well suited to those who are not smartphone savvy.It is attractive,lightweight and seems sturdy.My niece absolutely adores it.

Reviews.Title: Too Small
Reviews.Author: Jaz
Reviews.Content: The phone is as large as a calculator. I felt like I was carrying a toy phone when I took it out of its package.

Reviews.Title: so in love with this phone
Reviews.Author: Alvone Moore "angelbaby"
Reviews.Content: this phone is for true hello kitty lovers i love that its small most wont, it works great and had no problems

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jessica M. Wolf
Reviews.Content: Get what you pay for, it is my favorite phone and no one else local has one.  Not a super fast on Internet

Reviews.Title: Hello Kitty!!!
Reviews.Author: Zulma Muñoz
Reviews.Content: I love Hello Kitty and this phone is very cute!!! It was my first android device and I think it is great

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Alejandra Pazos Almada
Reviews.Content: Super cute and adorable phone. Not a lot of memory, but hry, It's a kid's phone. Is an awesome product though

Reviews.Title: Like it for my teenage daugther
Reviews.Author: MARIA BRISSETT
Reviews.Content: I brought this phone for my teenage Daugther and she is so excited about the Phone... I'm Glad it can be used in Jamaica with a sim card

Reviews.Title: pretty cool
Reviews.Author: NEO "Stupidity Kills"
Reviews.Content: got it for my sister and she loves it. everything outside to inside (not parts, but like apps and icons,etc) are all hello kitty stuff.

Reviews.Title: ok item, over priced
Reviews.Author: bmck
Reviews.Content: The service on this phone is terrible. My other phone gets great service. The calls drop, half of the time I will get a voicemail notification and the phone never rings. I do not live in a rural area. The calls I do get are very choppy.

Reviews.Title: absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: Denisse
Reviews.Content: Though I am not very fond of this touch screen, the phone itself is just fine. Looks good, works well - Thank you!

Reviews.Title: very cute
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Ellis
Reviews.Content: I love it, its so cute and easy to use.  Have been playing with it and had add more programs to the phone.  thanks it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: FILIPE
Reviews.Content: Good deal bought this phone for one of my two daoughters the phone works just fine in Mozambique and she's happy with it...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jorge Corado/Monares
Reviews.Content: came up with memory full thanks for the good product, so the tube 5 stars as a good customer, :)

Reviews.Title: Nancy
Reviews.Author: Nancy Camejo
Reviews.Content: Es muy bueno, y cómodo, lo compre para Venezuela y funciona muy bien el único detalle es q la cámara no tiene Flash de resto es adorable!!! lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Hello Kitty
Reviews.Author: Cherrie M.
Reviews.Content: i love it for it is a pink hello kitty phone and like the other phone i ordered it was an international version and i couldnt understand the language it was programed in.i will order another one as soon as i get my refund for the phone that i just sent back due to manufacturer defcets.another brand from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: GShock
Reviews.Content: Wife loved it very much although it took her awhile to get use to a touch screen phone. Use the earphone once in awhile, screen is too sensetive sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Hello kitty
Reviews.Author: Alessandra Zanuto
Reviews.Content: I liked a lot this product, Thanks for all and for a faster shippment. I really will by with you other product.

Reviews.Title: Cutest Hello Kitty phone
Reviews.Author: mati
Reviews.Content: The package arrived on time. Very fast, actually. Phone was in a sealed box. I charged the phone right away and I am using it now. I highly recommend this phone and the seller. I will buy again from this seller.

Reviews.Title: kool
Reviews.Author: drattalinob
Reviews.Content: great mobile good quality is perfest for girls who love hello kitye, i want to bay more like this "Samsung"

Reviews.Title: bello
Reviews.Author: aguedez
Reviews.Content: es demasiado bello, mi hija lo amo desde el primer momento, es facil de manejar y muy intuitivo, lo recomiendo plenamente

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone!
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this phone to anyone that loves Hello Kitty. The phone worked as soon as I received it. The charger does not work though. That was disappointing. Over all a cute phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for a Kitty lover
Reviews.Author: Assaf Katan
Reviews.Content: Small yet convenient handset, very elegant, fully Hello Kitty branded :-)Has all the required functionality.Both daughter and parents highly satisfied.

Reviews.Title: I love it..
Reviews.Author: Rosa
Reviews.Content: I really like it, the only problem is that it doesnt grab 3g, only working on edge but connect to wifi and the internet works faster. other than that its an amazing phone, for hello kitty fans..

Reviews.Title: Toooooooooooooooo Cute
Reviews.Author: MzTee
Reviews.Content: I brought the phone for my 6 year old daughter and she loves it!!!! Would not recommend it for an adult but a child its perfect!!

Reviews.Title: great start for starter with GSM touch
Reviews.Author: KIKKOMAN
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mother in law. She loves it. My toddlers love it. Thanks. It has video as well which surprised me. My Glaxy samsung doesn't even have video cuz it was an old version, this is a very good phone except, probably for starters and early teens who want to have cell phone.

Reviews.Title: perfect for a pre-teen or little girl
Reviews.Author: mary rivera-jara
Reviews.Content: I thought it was sooo adorable but didn't realize how small ot was. I love that it has radio on it but the screen is too small for a growm woman. lol. should've paid attention to the measurements.

Reviews.Title: TELEFONO
Reviews.Author: mariherurdaneta
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE FUNCIONA MUY BIEN EN VENEZUELA MI HIJA ESTA FELIZ. PARA LO QUE SE QUERIA CUMPLE CON TODO. RAPIDA ENTREGA

Reviews.Title: JEINN RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Author: Jeinn Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Excellent article, we can say that is my first time shopping at Amazon, I never imagined that my experience would be so EXPECTACULAR ... I bought CELL PHONE IS SAMSUNG GALAXY AND HELLO KITTY EDITION 5360 VERY SATISFIED. A MEMORY BOX BRINGS YOUR 2G SD adapter, as well as the charger is European, GARGADOR ADDED TO AMERICAN TRANSFORMER ... My first time with an Android smartphone, VERY GOOD OPERATING SYSTEM, WORKS GREAT IN VENEZUELA AND SEIZE 3G signal with Digitel ... I highly recommend it and the seller, THANKS FOR BEING PENDING SHIPPING, NEXT YEAR I HOPE TO THE PURCHASE OF MY NEW CELL THIS SELLER .... 100 POINTS TO WIRELESS EVERYTHING.VENEZUELA VALENCIA RODRIGUEZ JEINN

Reviews.Title: A star for SEVERAL reasons.
Reviews.Author: AustinAMedina
Reviews.Content: Now let me just say that this phone in particular, is indeed cute.. BUT it is strictly meant for kids. I went from the worst 4g phone the pink sidekick newest version, to this & went back to my sidekick. This phone is sooooooooooooooooooooo slow, I tried to download instagram and it took forever for it to NOT load. It's really small, like nokia small. I tried my best to deal with it & said I was going to be okay with this phone...... yeah that didn't work zoo I sold it and made 10 profit. And what.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Android OS, v2.3.5 (Gingerbread)
3.0" TFT capacitive touchscreen; TouchWiz UI; TouchWiz UI
2MP Camera, Video, Wi-Fi; Bluetooth; FM Radio; GPS (with A-GPS Support)
180 MB, 290 MB RAM + microSD Slot expandable to 32 GB
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Y S5360/S5363 Unlocked GSM Phone with Android 2.3 OS, Touchscreen, 2MP Camera, GPS, WiFi, Bluetooth, FM Radio and microSD Slot - Hello Kitty
